Package index

All functions

crop_to_extent()
Crop raster to extent
download_soil_tables() download_flo1k_tables() download_cgiar_tables() download_merit_dem_tables() download_hydrography90m_tables() download_observed_climate_tables() download_projected_climate_tables() download_landcover_tables()
Download Environment90m tables
download_test_data()
Download test data
download_tiles()
Download files of the Hydrography90m dataset
extract_from_gpkg()
Extract values from the stream order .gpkg files.
extract_ids()
Extract sub-catchment and/or basin IDs
extract_lake_ids()
Extract lake ids
extract_zonal_stat()
Calculate zonal statistics
get_all_upstream_distances()
Get all upstream distances for all subc_id
get_catchment_graph()
Get catchment from stream network graph
get_centrality()
Get centrality indexes from stream network graph
get_distance()
Calculate euclidean or along the network distance between points located in one basin
get_distance_graph()
Get the distance in meters between stream segments along a network graph
get_distance_parallel()
Calculate euclidean or along the network distance between points
get_lake_catchment()
Get lake catchments based on intersection points between stream network and lake
get_lake_intersection()
Get intersection points between Hydrography90m stream network and lake shapefiles
get_modelfit_table()
Get environmental variables at each occurrence and pseudo-absence point location
get_pfafstetter_basins()
Get Pfafstetter sub-basins
get_predict_table()
Get predict table
get_regional_unit_id()
Get Hydrography90m regional unit IDs
get_segment_neighbours()
Get stream segment neighbours
get_tile_id()
Get the Hydrography90m 20°x20° tile ID
get_upstream_catchment()
Delineate the upstream catchment
get_upstream_variable()
Calculate upstream variables for each sub-catchment
merge_tiles()
Merge raster or vector objects
read_geopackage()
Read a GeoPackage file
reclass_raster()
Reclassify a raster layer
report_no_data()
Report NoData value
set_no_data()
Set no data value
snap_to_network()
Snap points to stream segment based on distance or flow accumulation
snap_to_subc_segment()
Snap points to stream segment within the sub-catchment
split_table()
Split table
